id.description: The unique identifier for this sequence.

campaignId.description: The unique identifier for the campaign associated with this sequence.

enabled.description: Indicates if the sequence is currently enabled or disabled.

onAir.description: Indicates if the sequence is currently on air or not.

reason.description: The reason behind the on air status of the sequence.

cachedLogoUrl.description: The cached URL for the logo of the sequence.

id.description: The unique identifier of this promoted link.

text.description: The textual content of the promoted link.

creationTime.description: The timestamp indicating when this promoted link was created.

lastModified.description: The timestamp of the last modification made to this promoted link.

url.description: The URL associated with the promoted link.

siteName.description: The name of the site where the promoted link is displayed.

sectionName.description: The name of the section where the promoted link is displayed.

status.description: The status of the promoted link.

enabled.description: Indicates if the promoted link is currently enabled or disabled.

cachedImageUrl.description: The cached URL for the image of the promoted link.

campaignId.description: The unique identifier of the campaign associated with this promoted link.

archived.description: Indicates if the promoted link is archived.

documentLanguage.description: The language used in the promoted link document.

onAir.description: Indicates if the promoted link is currently on air or not.

reason.description: The reason behind the on air status of the promoted link.

baseUrl.description: The base URL of the promoted link.

documentId.description: The document identifier of the promoted link.

sequenceId.description: The identifier of the sequence to which this promoted link belongs.

sequenceOrder.description: The order of this promoted link within the sequence.

status.description: The approval status of the promoted link.

isEditable.description: Indicates if the promoted link is editable or not.

imageType.description: The type of image used in the promoted link.

language.description: The language associated with the promoted link.

creationTime.description: The timestamp indicating when this sequence was created.

lastModified.description: The timestamp of the last modification made to this sequence.

totalCount.description: The total count of sequences available for the specified criteria.

count.description: The number of sequences fetched in the current request.
